title: Cool Aetern Facts
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
The following is a series of images that were made for [[*user bigslothonmyface]] for the 2021 holiday gift exchange, depicting various Aeterns from [[[SCP-6002]]].
[[/=]]

[[=]]
++ Greater Tusker (//Duro scrofa//)

[[image https://i.imgur.com/M6WdRav.png]]
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/L1tacLj.png]]


++ Weitsjourner (//Weitsjourner weitsjourner//)

[[image https://i.imgur.com/dNYkyAE.png]]
@@ @@

[[image https://i.imgur.com/cELU03v.png]]

++ Darwin's Dragon (//Draco darwini//)

[[image https://i.imgur.com/25JhaKx.png]]
@@ @@
[[image https://i.imgur.com/AfYuNkz.png]]

[[/=]]

[[=]]
This is my first serious attempt at artwork. Thanks to [[*user Smaugnolia]] for helping me figure out Krita's brush smoothing function, [[*user Dexanote]] for providing anatomical advice, and [[*user Grigori Karpin]] and [[*user HarryBlank]] for providing feedback.
[[/=]]
